name: RoomBattle
description:
__________________________________ Use the power of your magic vacuum robot in order to repel all the jealous.

This robot is hard to control but give you powerful weapons to repel your opponents.
Adapt yourself to the random weapons in order to keep your vacuum robot as long as possible. __________________________________ This game is :
  1. Fun gameplay about scoring.
  2. Multiples weapons with unique abilities.
  3. Dynamic blood system.
  4. Addictive.
  5. At the end, you would like to buy a vacuum robot.
#### Game originally done at GlobalGameJam 2021
By Que Bab Studios.

Art By Mr.Costard & AliaCode By Zeldarck & Nota BeignetSound By Hyperspace Jelly
